definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
to request the pleasure of seeing sb/to ask sb in/to ask sb to do sth (e.g. make a speech)
to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner

sentences.english: If my little bit wrong incoming letter word disease sentence invites help correct that.
sentences.chinese: 如果我的來信有一些錯詞病句請幫忙糾正。

sentences.english: Please tell the boy not barge about the room.
sentences.chinese: 請叫那男孩別在房間裏亂碰亂撞。

sentences.english: Can you name three celebrity endorsers who endorse the sports brand?
sentences.chinese: 請閣下舉出三個運動品牌的代言人？

sentences.english: Please lay the maxim to your heart.
Please click here for past issues of "e-Newsletter".
sentences.chinese: 查閱前期《電子快訊》請按此。

sentences.english: Limited seats offered in first-served basis. Please fill in the form and return as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 名額有限先到先得方法取錄，請儘快填妥寄回。

sentences.english: Let me send you our catalog in English.
sentences.chinese: 請拿一本圖書目錄給我看看。

sentences.english: She said to call a week to three days before leaving.
sentences.chinese: 請在您要離開前三至七天左右再打電話過來。

sentences.english: Come and look round our shop without commitment to buy anything.
sentences.chinese: 請隨時來我們商店轉轉，不一定非要買東西。

sentences.english: Please obey the rules, NOT to crowd or play around when you are touring.
sentences.chinese: 參觀遊覽時，請遵守秩序，不要擁擠打鬧。

sentences.english: Give me a determinate answer to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 請對該問題給我一個確定的回答。

sentences.english: What did they do? Please give at least two examples.
sentences.chinese: 他們做了什麼？請至少舉出兩個例子。

sentences.english: Please attach copy of your HKID card or registration slip(s).
sentences.chinese: 請附身份證或註冊證副本。

sentences.english: Will you please use your influence with him not to do it?
sentences.chinese: 請你運用你的影響力叫他不要做那事好嗎？

sentences.english: You do not so serious to me, I'm afraid I will betray you.
sentences.chinese: 請你別對我那麼認真，只怕我會背叛你。

definition: must/to need to/to be sure to
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
